name: vscode-mermaid-preview
description: Previews Mermaid diagrams in Visual Studio Code

mermaid.vscode.minimap.description: This option controls if the minimap is rendered

mermaid.vscode.dark.description: Default mermaid theme used for dark theme

mermaid.vscode.light.description: Default mermaid theme used for light theme

mermaid.theme.description: One of the themes bundled with mermaid: default, forest, dark, neutral. null disables theme

mermaid.logLevel.description: This option decides the amount of logging to be used. debug: 1, info: 2, warn: 3, error: 4, fatal: (default) 5

mermaid.securityLevel.description: Sets the level of trust to be used on the parsed diagrams. true: (default) tags in text are encoded, click functionality is disabeled, false: tags in text are allowed, click functionality is enabled

mermaid.startOnLoad.description: This options controls whether or mermaid starts when the page loads.

mermaid.flowchart.htmlLabels.description: Flag for setting whether or not a html tag should be used for rendering labels on the edges.

mermaid.sequence.diagramMarginX.description: Margin to the right and left of the sequence diagram

mermaid.sequence.diagramMarginY.description: Margin to the over and under the sequence diagram.

mermaid.sequence.boxTextMargin.description: Margin around the text in loop/alt/opt boxes

mermaid.sequence.bottomMarginAdj.description: Prolongs the edge of the diagram downwards

mermaid.sequence.useMaxWidth.description: When this flag is set the height and width is set to 100% and is then scaling with the available space if not the absolute space required is used

mermaid.sequence.rightAngles.description: This will display arrows that start and begin at the same node as right angles, rather than a curve

mermaid.sequence.showSequenceNumbers.description: This will show the node numbers

mermaid.gantt.titleTopMargin.description: Margin top for the text over the gantt diagram

mermaid.gantt.barHeight.description: Margin top for the text over the gantt diagram

mermaid.gantt.barGap.description: The margin between the different activities in the gantt diagram.

mermaid.gantt.topPadding.description: Margin between title and gantt diagram and between axis and gantt diagram.

mermaid.gantt.leftPadding.description: The space allocated for the section name to the left of the activities.

mermaid.gantt.gridLineStartPadding.description: Vertical starting position of the grid lines.

mermaid.gantt.numberSectionStyles.description: The number of alternating section styles.

mermaid.gantt.axisFormat.description: Datetime format of the axis, this might need adjustment to match your locale and preferences.
